pageContent:
Shaik Anees Ahmad
8686264294 | aneesahmad0616@gmail.com | LinkedIn | Github | Leetcode
1 year experienced Passionate Full Stack Developer seeking to build scalable SaaS platforms and diverse web applications
with modern frontend and backend technologies, real-world integrations, and intuitive user experiences.
Experience
Full Stack Developer Oct 2024 – present
Vecros Technologies Private Ltd Bengaluru
• Developed interactive 2D/3D inspection tools (react-konva, three.js, Potree) for Spatial Cloud, reducing manual
site reporting time by approx 40% and enabling clients to remotely assess construction progress.
• Implemented a Warehouse visualizer (three.js, d3.js) to render pallets/boxes with color-coded inventory and
drill-down details on click, improving stock visibility and reducing warehouse audit time by approx 30%.
• Led UI development for Spatial Cloud, WMS, Accounts, Developers, and Docs portals delivering

drill-down details on click, improving stock visibility and reducing warehouse audit time by approx 30%.
• Led UI development for Spatial Cloud, WMS, Accounts, Developers, and Docs portals delivering
consistent, user-friendly interfaces that increased product adoption and improved customer onboarding experience
• Built a centralized login system across Accounts, Developers, and Docs portals using AWS Cognito,
streamlining authentication and reducing user drop-offs during login by approx 25%.
• Optimized backend workflows with AWS API Gateway, Lambda, and DynamoDB by debugging errors and
validating event payloads, cutting down API failure rates and enhancing system reliability.
• Revamped company website design for better responsiveness and accessibility, lowering bounce rate by approx
15% and improving developer efficiency through reusable UI components.
Projects
Smart Home Web App | Javascript, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, Tailwind CSS
Website | Github - Frontend, Github - Backend

Projects
Smart Home Web App | Javascript, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, Tailwind CSS
Website | Github - Frontend, Github - Backend
• Developed a comprehensive smart home application using the MERN stack
• Built a responsive and user-friendly interface in React.js, with seamless cross-device interaction.
• Created RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js to handle all frontend-backend communication.
• Implemented JWT-based authentication, used Mongoose with MongoDB for secure, structured data storage.
• Deployed both frontend and backend on Render to ensure scalability and continuous uptime.
• Users can register/login, add rooms, and interact with device simulations — all backed by persistent state.
Food App | Javascript, React.js, Tailwind CSS
Github
• Integrated the Swiggy API to fetch real-time restaurant data, menus, and pricing using React.js.
• Built a responsive UI for browsing restaurants, food categories, and dishes, with search and top-rated filters.

• Built a responsive UI for browsing restaurants, food categories, and dishes, with search and top-rated filters.
• Utilized ES6+ features like arrow functions, destructuring, and template literals for clean, maintainable code.
• Wrote unit tests using Jest to validate React components, improving reliability and reducing bugs.
Technical Skills
Programming Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C
Markup & Styling: HTML, CSS
Frontend: React.js, Tailwind CSS, MUI, Bootstrap, Angular, WordPress
Backend: Node.js, Express.js, Mongoose
Database: MongoDB, MySQL
Cloud & Devops: AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, S3, Cognito, CloudWatch), Docker
Tools: Git, GitHub, Postman, VS Code
